widgets.title: Golden Signals Traffic - Throughput Per Minute

queries.nrql: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) AS 'Requests per Minute' FROM Transaction FACET appName since 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE limit 5
SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) AS 'Requests per Minute' FROM Transaction FACET appName since 1 day ago TIMESERIES 10 minute EXTRAPOLATE limit 5

SELECT filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '3%' as '3xx'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '4%' as '4xx'), filter(count(*), WHERE httpResponseCode LIKE '5%' as '5xx') FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago FACET appName limit 5
